+50% Combat Bonus against hover and air units.
May intercept air units one additional time per turn.
First Modern Era anti-aircraft unit that specializes in defeating hover and air units. Has a 50% chance of intercepting air units.

The Anti-Aircraft Gun is the first available anti-aircraft unit. The Anti-Aircraft Gun receives a +100% Combat Bonus against hover and air units. The Anti-Aircraft Gun has a 50% chance of intercepting and damaging one incoming enemy air unit per turn.
Atomic Era anti-aircraft unit that specializes in defeating hover and air units. Has a 50% chance of intercepting air units.

The Mobile SAM is the last available anti-aircraft unit, replacing the Anti-Aircraft Gun. The Mobile SAM receives a +100% Combat Bonus against hover and air units. The Mobile SAM has a 50% chance of intercepting and damaging one incoming enemy air unit per turn.

First Ancient Era mounted ranged unit that does not receive defensive terrain bonuses and loses all movement points upon entering rough terrain. Requires a source of [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horses to be built.

The Chariot Archer is the first available mounted ranged unit. The Chariot Archer does not receive defensive terrain bonuses and loses all [ICON_MOVES] Movement points upon entering rough terrain. The Chariot Archer requires a source of [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horses to be built.
